lead_paragraph: Four horses were suspended from Olympic show jumping Thursday after tests showed that the skin of the horses may have been treated with a banned derivative of chili peppers.
snippet: Four horses were suspended from Olympic show jumping Thursday after tests showed that the skin of the horses may have been treated with a banned derivative of chili peppers.
